messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Fw: [unschooling-dotcom] CHICAGO TRIBUNE
messages.msgSnippet: I managed to squeeze in a few minutes to reply to the person writing the article. I posted my response at our blog, if anyone would like to read it.
messages.messageBody:
I managed to squeeze in a few minutes to reply to the person writing the
article.
I posted my response at our blog, if anyone would like to read it.

http://thewildtribe.blogspot.com/2006/03/unschooling-article-interview.html


Namaste~
Karen

messages.subject: Fw: [unschooling-dotcom] CHICAGO TRIBUNE
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Vincent Schodolski To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent:
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Vincent Schodolski<mailto:vincent_schodolski@...>
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com<mailto:unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 20, 2006 1:52 PM
Subject: [unschooling-dotcom] CHICAGO TRIBUNE


I am the West Coast Bureau Chief for the Chicago Tribune based in Los
Angeles. I am looking for people who can help me with an article I am
doing on unschooling. I am looking for families presently engaged in
unschooling to gather their points of view and their experiences. I can
be reached at either of the two e-mails below.

Vincent_Schodolski@...<mailto:Vincent_Schodolski@...>

or

VSchodolski@...<mailto:VSchodolski@...>

Many thanks.

Vince







This is the discussion list for the Unschooling.com website: http://www.unschooling.com<http://www.unschooling.com/>

Yahoo! Groups Links
